alt_text: A bold teacher shirt with the phrase “Lick-Free Zone” in playful fonts, featuring a cartoon tongue crossed out. Designed to stop the germy chaos with humor and style. From EDUHaHa.
caption:
We’ve tried rules. We’ve tried rewards. Now? We try sarcasm.
Say hello to the Lick-Free Zone — our newest teacher tee designed to fight back against the coughs, sneezes, and sticky fingers of classroom chaos.

🛡️ One shirt. Maximum boundary.

Shop now → eduhaha.com/products/lick-free-zone-t-shirt

alt_text: Funny teacher shirt showing ‘Meet the Parents’ with zoo animals in a pickup line — lion, giraffe, monkey and more. A light-hearted nod to school dismissal madness.
caption:
Dismissal duty got you feeling like a zookeeper?

This shirt’s for the teachers who’ve seen it all — and still show up with a smile. ‘Meet the Parents’ isn’t just a shirt. It’s a badge of survival.

Shop the chaos → eduhaha.com/products/meet-the-parents-t-shirt

alt_text: Funny ‘Save Jimmy’ teacher shirt showing a student stuck to a frozen pole with the caption ‘There’s one every year.’
caption:
Every school year has a Jimmy. ❄️

This shirt is your official winter duty badge — and a warning to future students.

Wear it proud. Save recess.
